mapper.insert: insert into todo_mst values( 0, #{todocontent}, 0, #{importance_flag}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select tm.todocode,
tm.todocontent, tm.todo_complete, tm.importance_flag,
tt.total_count,
tm.create_date, tm.update_date
from todo_mst tm LEFT OUTER JOIN (select COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM todo_mst) tt ON (1 = 1) order by todocode desc limit #{index}, #{count}
